info.narration: #0 enters $0's containment unit to begin work.

collection.name: A Phone Call from Hell
collection.openText: Place the receiver to your ear, and you will hear voices from another world.

observe.desc: [ {I heard a rumor that this phone connected to the afterlife. I don't know if it's true, but... Trembling and lifting the receiver, I dialed the phone number of that colleague. After a moment, someone responded. “Don't...! Don't come to this horrible place...!” Amidst the mournful screams, I heard my coworker's heartbreaking voice. A few seconds later, the other end of the phone fell silent.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: Employees who answer the phone will continuously lose SP.
When an employee is answering $0, all employees in the department will gain work success rate and work speed over time. They will also recover a small amount of HP at intervals.
Employees who stay on the line for too long will be dragged to hell.
